description:
Reinforcements sent by Unilord arrive and assist in cleaning up the aftermath of the battle with Tzveta and Kufufu. Afterward, Teru ends up with an intense cold that leads Iko to look after her and realize just how normal heroes are.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: When I Cough, It`s the Two of Us
せきをすれば, ふたり
